      • preserveTimestamp

        public FileWritingMessageHandlerSpec preserveTimestamp(boolean preserveTimestamp)
        Set to true to preserve the destination file timestamp. If true and the payload is a File, the payload's lastModified time will be transferred to the destination file.
        Parameters:
        preserveTimestamp - the boolean flag to use.
        Returns:
        the spec.
        Since:
        1.2
        See Also:
        FileWritingMessageHandler.setPreserveTimestamp(boolean)
